api_list.name: Check server status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://waifu.p.rapidapi.com/v1/server/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "waifu.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

api_list.name: Get all users paged by hundreds
api_list.description: Get all users paged by hundreds
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "waifu.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
